foods.name: Chicken Pot Pie
foods.description: This delicious meal is awesome all year round, and an absolute favorite of my children.  Using your InstaPot or even a pre-cooked Rotisserie chicken from your local grocer makes this a fast go-to in the winter.

foods.name: Apple Turnover
foods.description: Keeping it 100, I just throw a frozen Pepperidge Farm apple turnover in the oven when I want these.  Maybe one day, I'll make one from scratch. Lol.

foods.name: Fiesta Mac
foods.description: So, I made some spicy chili one day and had some macaroni and cheese in the fridge.  Viola, fiesta mac!  Give it a try and put your own twist on it.

foods.name: Steak Quesadilla
foods.description: Cafe Rio is still my go to for a delicious steak quesadilla, but I've made a few myself that come close.  Add as much spice as you can handle.

foods.name: Chocolate Lava Cake
foods.description: I mean, be honest.  What's better than a slice of chocolate cake?  How about warm gooey chocolate oozing out after you stick your fork in?  Enter, the chocolate lava cake.  Don't forget your scoop of vanilla ice cream!

foods.name: Jerk Chicken Alfredo Pasta
foods.description: I ordered a delicious chicken Rasta Pasta from a nearby Jamaican restaurant, but boy it was spicier than I could handle.  So, I whipped up one of my own. Perfecto!

foods.name: Black Bean Nachos
foods.description: Sometimes you don't feel like cooking meat.  Season up some black beans and toss them on some tortilla chips.  Then keep grabbing ingredients until you have a mountain of nachos.  Dig in!

foods.name: Blueberry Yogurt Parfait
foods.description: Simple, quick, healthy, and sweet.  Oh, and did I mention only 3 ingredients?  Blueberries, yogurt, and granola.  Hits the spot!

foods.name: Ground Turkey Tacos
foods.description: Taco Tuesday!  Who am I kidding?  These are great any day of the week.

foods.name: Meatballs & Spaghetti Squash
foods.description: Sometimes, you have to just go low carb.  Roast a spaghetti squash and pair it with your favorite meatballs.

foods.name: Hazelnut Gelato
foods.description: Find yourself a nice gelato spot.  Waaaaaayyyy better than ice cream.

foods.name: Turkey Meatball Sub
foods.description: Who doesn't like juicy meatballs on a fresh toasted kaiser roll?  Want to jazz this delicious meal up?  Add turkey pepperoni and baby spinach leaves!

foods.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
foods.description: Warm from the oven with a cold glass of milk is how I like them!  The chocolate just melts in your mouth! Yum!

foods.name: Stuffed Bell Peppers
foods.description: Have this low-carb meal packed with nutrients.  These peppers can be stuffed with anything from rice, ground beef, or even shredded chicken.  Make them spicy or top them with your favorite cheese.  Absolutely delicious!

foods.name: Chicken Nuggets
foods.description: Always a great go to for the kids.  Jazz it up for the parent with a spicy siracha dip.

foods.name: Chocolate Chip Cookies
foods.description: Warm from the oven with a cold glass of milk is how I like them!  The chocolate just melts in your mouth! Yum!

foods.name: Turkey Meatball Sub
foods.description: Who doesn't like juicy meatballs on a fresh toasted kaiser roll?  Want to jazz this delicious meal up?  Add turkey pepperoni and baby spinach leaves!
